story_arceus_07_06000/2401_1101_0100_20:
After some time had passed, on the day
before the Arceus Cup...
story_arceus_07_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We’ve been patrolling the skies, and it seems
Team Rocket’s sticking to their promise of not
causing trouble.
story_arceus_07_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Come to think of it, I’ve seen a bunch of
different worlds thanks to Pidgeot’s flying.
story_arceus_07_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
And now I know Red’s not the only Trainer
out there who’s super talented.
story_arceus_07_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Thanks, Pidgeot. You’ve expanded my
horizons.
story_arceus_07_06000/2401_1001_0600_10: Oh! Can’t forget the rest of you...
story_arceus_07_06000/2401_1001_0700_10: I’ll be counting on ALL of you tomorrow!
story_arceus_07_06000/2401_1001_0800_10: Are you ready for the big battle, Blue?
